definition: A person who operates a motor vehicle, typically used to refer to someone who drives a car.

examples.english: The driver was driving too fast.

examples.german: Die Autofahrer müssen an der Ampel warten.
examples.english: The drivers have to wait at the traffic light.

examples.german: Der Autofahrer parkte sein Auto am Straßenrand.
examples.english: The driver parked his car on the side of the road.

examples.german: Die Autofahrer müssen den Verkehrsstau umfahren.
examples.english: The drivers have to bypass the traffic jam.

examples.german: Der Autofahrer wurde von der Polizei angehalten.
examples.english: The driver was stopped by the police.
